Chinese: 点击已经登录过的账号进行游戏

English:
If this tournament is cancelled due to a lack of participants, all entries will be cancelled and all
entry fees will be fully refunded.
Chinese: 如果本次比赛因人数不足取消，已参与的比赛将被中止，您的报名费将全额返还！

Chinese: 取消第三方授权需要绑定邮箱账号，是否前往绑定？

English: Your ranking will be decided by your score after every player completes the game. For players with the same final score, those who finish up earlier will rank higher.
Chinese: 当你完成比赛并提交分数后进行排名，如果出现分数相同，较早完成比赛的玩家排名更高。

English: Players compete in a #1#-rounds tournament.Defeat your opponents to win every round,The user who reaches the top will win.
Chinese: 锦标赛进行#round#轮，每轮获胜的玩家晋级，决赛获胜的玩家取得最终的胜利。

English:
1) Your have #1# times to play the game and hit the rank. Pay #2# for each entry.

1，本场赛事你可以参与#1#次，每次入场费#2#；

English: Your may only change your username once
Your have no times to change your username
Chinese: 您当前已没有修改昵称次数

English: Congratulations, your nickname/avatar has been changed
Chinese: 恭喜！您的昵称/头像已经修改成功！

English: You can change your nickname with a rename card redeemed in Tickets Store!
Chinese: 修改昵称次数不足，您可以在奖券商城购买改名卡！

English:
Bonus Cash is an in-game currency that can beobtained from various game modes and used to enter Cash Games.

Players can receive Bonus Cash prizes in matches with a cash Entry Fee requirement,Free Entry Events,activities such as Lucky Box,Spin coin and so on.

When you enter a Cash Game, $0.01 of your Bonus Cash of every $0.10 spent will be used to pay the Entry Fee .However, if Bonus Cash is the only currency available in your account, or the real cash in your Balance does not cover 90% of the entry fee, additional Bonus Cash will be used to enter the Cash Game.

When you win a Cash Game, any Bonus Cash that you have used to pay the Entry Fee will be returned to you and any additional winnings beyond your Entry Fee will be paid in Dollars.

lf you haven't entered a Cash Game in the past 7 days, all Bonus Cash in your Account may be forfeited.

When you apply for a withdrawal, your Bonus Cash will also be frozen and be forfeited once your application is approved. If your withdrawal is canceled or rejected, the Bonus Cash will be returned to your account.
Chinese:
奖励金是游戏内的奖励货币，它可以用于参加现金比赛。您可以从免费比赛、幸运宝箱、幸运转盘等活动中获得奖励金。

当您进入现金比赛，入场费每消耗0.10 美元，奖励金可以抵扣0.01美元。如果奖励金是您账户中唯一可用的货币，或者您的现金余额不足入场费的90%，则剩余的入场费可全额使用奖励金抵扣。

当您赢得现金赛时，您入场支付的奖励金将全额退还，超出的奖励将以美元进行发放。

如果您在过去 7 天内没有参加现金比赛，您的奖励金有可能被回收。

当您进行提现申请时，您的奖励金将被冻结。如果您的提款被取消或拒绝，奖金金将退还给您。

欢迎回到游戏！
您今日可领取:#1#

English: You got the bouns fot day 1, Watch videos to get multiple rewards.
Chinese: 您获得了首日奖励，观看视频可获得多倍奖励！

English: You have got day 1 bouns, come back tomorrow for the #1#.
Chinese: 您已领取首日奖励，明日登录可领取:#1#
观看视频领取多倍奖励

English:
1. You can spin the wheels for extra prizes! Each wheel costs a different number of currencies.
2.The higher level of the spinning wheel, the better the prizes! All monetary prizes are sent in the form of Bonus Cash.
3. As you get the prize, If you spin a wheel a wheel labeled"Dice Dare", You will able to guess the number on a dice.You will double your prize if your guess is right, but you will lose your prize if your guess is wrong.
Chinese:
1，您可以参与幸运转盘获得高额奖励，参与转盘需要消耗不同类型的货币；
2，转盘等级越高，可获得的奖励越丰富（转盘获得的奖励都为奖励金）；
3，中奖时，如果你参与有“幸运翻倍”的转盘，你可以参与猜骰子翻倍。如果猜对数字，您的奖励将翻倍，如果猜错，您将失去您的奖品（中途可随时领取奖励）。

English: Your prize will be doubled if you guess right and cleared if you guess wrong!
Chinese: 猜对数字即可翻倍奖励！猜错将失去奖励！

English: Congrats!! You just doubled your prize! You can still make #1# guesses if all your guesses are correct.
Chinese: 恭喜您！您的奖励已经翻倍，您还可参与#1#次。

English: You have used all your guesses. Your prize is now #1# times greater than before.
Chinese: 您的竞猜次数已用完，您的奖励已经翻了#1#倍！

English: Oh no! That wasn't the right answer. Better luck next time.
Chinese: 非常遗憾！您猜错了！祝您下次好运！

English: Play #1# more games to unlock ranks.
Win medal to climb the ranks Earn 1medal for each $1 you win
Chinese: 参与比赛赢得勋章来提升排名，每赢得$1可获得1枚高级勋章！

English: Your current balance includes both cash available to withdraw and Bonus Cash.
Chinese: 您当前的余额包括可提现金额和奖励金金额。

English: Bonus Cash can only be used to enter cash games and cannot be withdrawn.
Chinese: 奖励金只可用于参与现金赛，不可用于提现。

English:
1. Withdrawals under $10.00 are subject to a $1.50 processing fee.The minimum withdrawal is $2.00.
2.Bonus cash cannot be withdrawn. When you submit a withdrawal application, all of the Bonus Cash you have will be:
1) Frozen while your withdrawal application isprocessing;
2) Forfeited after the Withdrawal Application isapproved and/or the Withdrawal Amount is sent.
Chinese:
1，提现低于$10.00需支付$1.5的手续费，最低提现金额为$2.00；
2，奖励金不可提现，在您提交提现申请时，你的奖励金将：
1）在提交提现申请后被冻结；
2）在提现申请通过/完成后将被回收。

English: Your application will be processed in 3 bussiness days.
Chinese: 您的申请将在3个工作日内进行处理。

English: Once initial processing is complete,please allow an additional 3-5 business days for bank processing.
Chinese: 申请通过后，银行需要3-5个工作日进行放款处理。

English: You have cancelled your withdrawal.Your cash/bouns cash has been returnd to you.
Chinese: 您已取消提现，您的现金/奖励金已返还给您。

English: Your application isn't approved for following reason(s):
Chinese: 您的提现因为以下原因未通过：

English: your withdrawal Amount and frozen Bonus cash have been returned to your account balance.
Chinese: 您的提现金额和奖励金已经退回到您的账户。

English: Withdrawal have sent to your bank card.
Chinese: 提现金额已发放到您的银行卡。

English: You're so close to a real cash prize!Please save your account to keep it safe.
Chinese: 为了确保您账户资金安全 ，请保存您的账号！

English: Password: 6-20 characters , at least one letter and at least one number
Chinese: 密码：6-20个字符，至少一个字母和一个数字。
您输入的邮箱地址不正确

Chinese: 您输入的密码格式不正确

Chinese: 您输入的两个密码不一致

English: Link your account with your email address. You can use your email address to log in and reset your password.
Chinese: 将您的账号与您的邮箱相关联，你可以使用邮箱进行登录或找回密码。

English: Email sent.Open your email and click the confirmation link with in 30 minutes.
Chinese: 邮件发送成功！请前往邮箱点击邮件中的链接，链接30分钟内有效！
请先前往邮箱查看邮件！

English: You must verify your email address to perform this action.Please check your email and follow the instructions to complete the verification process. Please enter a new E-mail address if you want to change the email linked to your account.
Chinese: 您必须先验证您的邮箱再进行此操作！请先检查您的邮箱并按照说明完成验证过程。如果您想更改绑定的邮箱，请输入您的邮箱并进行验证。

English: Please input a new email address
Chinese: 请输入一个新的邮箱地址！

English: Sending emails too frequently, please try again later.
Chinese: 邮件发送太过频繁，请稍后再试。

English: *Describe the issue in less then 140 words.
Insert up to three images ( less than 3MB pre image ) .

English: What are Game Levels and Platform Level?
Chinese: 什么是游戏等级和平台等级？

English: What are Tickets? What is the Ticket Store?
Chinese: 什么是奖券？什么是奖券商城？

English: How do i win money on this app?
Why are cash games not available in my region?
Chinese: 为什么现金比赛在我的地区不可用？

English: How does ranking work and how do i get ranking prizes?
Chinese: 排行榜如何运作以及如何获得排名奖励？

English: How do you ensure that matches are fair?
How do l know that my opponent isn't cheating?
Chinese: 我怎么知道我的对手没有作弊？

English: what is a Match ID? How can l find and copy the Match ID?
Chinese: 什么是比赛ID？ 我如何找到并复制比赛ID？

English: Why is the app still searching for an opponent for me? why did my match get cancelled?
Chinese: 为什么仍在为我寻找对手？为什么我的比赛被取消了？

Chinese: 如果我的比赛以平局结束怎么办？

Chinese: 我如何将钱存入我的游戏帐户？

English: How can i see my balance?
How do i create an account?
What should i do if i forget my password?
Why do you need my personal information? How will it be used?
Chinese: 为什么需要我的个人信息？ 它将如何使用？

English: Why didn't i receive my sign-up verification email?
Chinese: 为什么我没有收到注册验证电子邮件？

English: How do i change my username?
Can i use the same account on different apps?
Chinese: 我可以在不同的应用程序上使用同一个帐户吗？

English: How do i contact customer service?

This is a casual competitive gaming app. On this app, you can compete with other players and get prizes by winnings games. We will not provide users with opportunities to cheat, all prizes depend on your ability.
We offer 1v1 games, Tournaments, Events, Multiplayer games, and many other match modes. In 1V1 Ticket Games and Cash Games, the winner gets all of the prizes. in Tournaments, Events, and Multiplayer games,the top players split the prize pools with players who rank higher getting larger prizes.
Players are only matched against each other when their skill levels are similar, so it may take some time to find an opponent.
Chinese:
这是一款休闲竞技类游戏应用。您可以在应用上与其他玩家竞技，并通过胜利赢取游戏奖品。我们不会为用户提供作弊机会，所有奖品取决于您的能力。
我们提供 1v1 游戏、锦标赛、活动赛、多人赛等各种比赛模式。在1V1奖券比赛和现金比赛中，获胜者将获得所有奖品。在锦标赛、活动赛和多人赛中，排名靠前的玩家瓜分奖池，排名越高，获得的奖品更丰厚。
玩家只会与自己相同水平的对手相匹配，因此可能需要一些时间才能找到对手。

English:
We want players to feel a sense of accomplishment as they play through the various games on our platform. Gamers can show off their unique accomplishments with Levels. A Game Level displays your master of a specific game. Your platform Level shows off your experience by taking all the titles you play into account. If you work hard enough, you can reach level 100 and truly show your game mastery!

Statement:
You can gain exp by winning games. The exp gained in each game can increase the platform level, but only the level of the current game.
Chinese:
我们希望玩家在玩我们平台上的各种游戏时拥有成就感，因此通过等级来展示他们独特的成就。其中游戏等级反映了您对特定游戏的掌握程度，而您的平台等级则反映了您玩过的所有游戏的总体验程度。如果你足够努力，你可以达到100级，真正展现你对游戏的掌握！

备注：
您可以通过赢得比赛获得经验，不同游戏每场比赛获得的经验值可以提升平台等级，但仅可提升当前游戏的等级。

English:
Bonus Cash is an in-game currency that can beobtained from various game modes and used to enter Cash Games.

Players can receive Bonus Cash prizes in matches with a cash Entry Fee requirement,Free Entry Events,activities such as Lucky Box,Spin coin and so on.

When you enter a Cash Game, $0.01 of your Bonus Cash of every $0.10 spent will be used to pay the Entry Fee .However, if Bonus Cash is the only currency available in your account, or the real cash in your Balance does not cover 90% of the entry fee, additional Bonus Cash will be used to enter the Cash Game.

When you win a Cash Game, any Bonus Cash that you have used to pay the Entry Fee will be returned to you and any additional winnings beyond your Entry Fee will be paid in Dollars.

lf you haven't entered a Cash Game in the past 7 days, all Bonus Cash in your Account may be forfeited.

When you apply for a withdrawal, your Bonus Cash will also be frozen and be forfeited once your application is approved. If your withdrawal is canceled or rejected, the Bonus Cash will be returned to your account.
Chinese:
奖励金是游戏内的奖励货币，它可以用于参加现金比赛。您可以从免费比赛、幸运宝箱、幸运转盘等活动中获得奖励金。

当您进入现金比赛，入场费每消耗0.10 美元，奖励金可以抵扣0.01美元。如果奖励金是您账户中唯一可用的货币，或者您的现金余额不足入场费的90%，则剩余的入场费可全额使用奖励金抵扣。

当您赢得现金赛时，您入场支付的奖励金将全额退还，超出的奖励将以美元进行发放。

如果您在过去 7 天内没有参加现金比赛，您的奖励金有可能被回收。

当您进行提现申请时，您的奖励金将被冻结。如果您的提款被取消或拒绝，奖金金将退还给您。

English:
1. What are Tickets?
Tickets are an in-game currency that can be earnedfrom matches, mini-games, and other events. You can use Tickets to enter Ticket Games and redeem items inthe Ticket Store.However, if you are located in a state where money winning apps are illegal, you will not beable to enter the Ticket Store.
You can get Tickets from:
-Cash Games (matches that require a cash Entry Fee)
-Ticket Games (matches that require a Ticket Entry Fee)
-Tasks (7-Day Challenges and Daily Challenges)
-Lucky Boxes
-The Bonus Wheel
-Other time-limited activities
2. What is the Ticket Store?
The Ticket Store is where you can use Tickets toredeem a variety of items. The more Tickets you have, the better prizes you can redeem.
Chinese:
1. 什么是奖券？
奖券是游戏中的一种货币，可以从比赛、小游戏和其他活动中获得。您可以使用奖券进入奖券比赛，获得的奖券还可以在奖券商城中兑换物品。但是，如果您所在的国家/地区的法律不允许，您将无法打开奖券商城。
您可以通过以下方式获取奖券：
-现金比赛（需要现金入场费的比赛）
-奖券比赛（需要奖券入场费的比赛）
-任务（7天挑战和每日挑战）
-幸运奖励
-幸运转盘
-其他限时活动
2. 什么是奖券商城？
您可以在奖券商城中使用奖券来兑换各种物品。您拥有的奖券越多，您可以兑换的奖品就越好。

English:
You can get cash prizes by winning matches that have cash prize pools, including but not limited to 1v1 Cash Games, Cash Fever in Ticket Games, Tournaments (where cash prizes are available for the top players), Events (where cash prizes are available for a
certain number of winners, depending on the event). A cash or Ticket Entry Fee may be required to play the match modes listed above, with the exception of Free Entry events. The Entry Fee requirement can be found on the bottom right side of the match entrance. By playing these matches, the winner(s) may receive a cash prize. A percentage of the cash winnings is real cash. Players can withdraw the real cash from their balance at any time. Once your withdrawal application is approved, we will send out your withdrawal as soon as possible.
There are other mini-games and events where players can get Bonus Cash prizes, such as Bonus Wheel and Lucky Box.
Chinese:
您可以通过赢得有现金奖池的比赛来获得现金奖励，包括但不限于1v1现金比赛、奖券比赛的现金奖励比赛、锦标赛（顶级玩家可获得现金奖励）、活动（部分活动，获胜者可获得现金奖励）。 除免费入场赛事除外，参加上述比赛模式需要支付现金或门票才可入场。参赛费用可在比赛入口的右下角找到。通过参与这些比赛，获胜者可以获得现金奖励。现金比赛的一部分是真实现金，玩家可以随时从使用他们余额中的现金进行提现。 一旦您的提现申请获得批准，我们将尽快完成您的提款。
您还可以参与其他小游戏和活动，通过这些获得可以获得奖励金，例如幸运转盘和幸运宝箱。

English:
Due to the laws in your region, cash games may not be allowed. You can go to the ticket games to enjoy the fun of the match, the ticket game is also fair and fun.
Of course, when you want to deposit，play cash games,withdrawal, and other operations, we need to obtain your location information, please authorize us your location so that we can better serve you.
Chinese:
根据您所在地区的法律，可能不允许玩现金比赛。单您还是可以通过玩奖券比赛享受比赛的乐趣，奖券比赛也同样公平有趣。
当然，当您进行充值、现金比赛、提款等操作时，我们需要获取您的位置信息，请授权我们您的位置，以便我们更好地为您服务。

English:
We divide the games into asynchronous games and synchronous games.
In asynchronous games, we will match players with similar strengths together. If the "challenger" is not matched temporarily (most common in some competitions with higher entry fee), the players will play first and remain in the waiting state. If the "challenger" is not matched after 24 hours, we will automatically cancel the match and refund your entry fee. In an asynchronous game, both players play the same match with the same conditions, but they do not have to play at the same time. The moves that one player makes do not affect the other player’s game.
A few of our games are synchronous, meaning both players play simultaneously, which means that the two players will settle in synchronous after the game is over.
Although most matches are asynchronous, we will never match two games that have already finished and have a score, since a player’s skill level is always assessed before a game is played, We will not match opponents beyond the player's skill level.
Chinese:
我们将比赛分为异步游戏和同步游戏。
在异步游戏中，我们会将实力相近的玩家配对在一起。如果“挑战者”暂时未匹配到（在一些入场费较高的比赛中最为常见），玩家将先进行比赛并保持在等待状态。 如果“挑战者”24小时后仍未匹配到，我们将自动取消比赛并退还您的报名费。在异步游戏中，两个玩家在相同的条件下进行相同的比赛，但他们不必同时进行。一个玩家的动作并不会影响另一个玩家的游戏。
我们有一些游戏是同步的，这意味着两个玩家可以同时比赛，也意味着两个玩家将在游戏结束后同步进行结算。
虽然大多数比赛是异步的，但我们永远不会匹配已经完成并有分数的两场比赛，因为我们是在比赛开始之前评估玩家的技能水平并进行匹配，我们不会匹配超出玩家技能水平的对手。

English: ln a 1v1 match, a player is matched with and plays against an opponent with a similar skill level. Most of the Cash Games and Ticket Games are 1v1 matches unless they are labeled other wise at the bottom of the match entrance.For example, there can be Multiplayer matches in Ticket Games that allow 5 or more players to compete against each other.
Chinese: 在1v1比赛中，玩家与具有相似技能水平的对手匹配并与之竞技。大多数现金比赛和奖券比赛都是1v1比赛，除非它们在比赛入口底部有其他标记。例如，奖券比赛中可以有多人比赛，允许5名或更多的玩家进行竞技。

English:
Multiplayer games include tournaments, events, etc. The tournament requires multiple rounds, each round is played against the matched opponent, and the winner advances to the next round until the champion is determined. In the event games, players compete for prizes based on their scores in a match. Most event matches can participate multiple times and will be ranked according to your highest score.
To make sure Multiplayer matches are fair, all playersplaying the same match will have identical game boardsand be matched against players of a similar skill level. Iftwo players end the game with the same final score, theplayer who finishes first will be ranked higher.
A Multiplayer match will be canceled if there are notenough players joining the match within 24 hours. Inthis case, your existing score will be canceled and yourEntry Fee will be refunded.
You can see the status of your opponents' matches in"Pending Games" in the Result tab.
Players will receive prizes corresponding to their resultsafter a match ends.Prize information can be found onthe match's result page or in their balance.
Chinese:
多人游戏包括锦标赛、活动赛等等。其中锦标赛需要进行多个轮次，每轮和匹配到的对手进行游戏，获胜的玩家晋级并进行下一轮比赛，直至决出冠军。在活动赛中，玩家根据他们在一场比赛中的得分来争夺奖品，大部分活动赛都可参与多次并按照您的最高分进行排名。
为确保多人比赛的公平性，所有参加同一场比赛的玩家将拥有相同的比赛内容，并与技能水平相似的玩家进行匹配。如果两名玩家以相同的最终得分结束游戏，则首先完成的玩家排名更高。
如果在24小时内没有足够的玩家加入比赛，多人比赛将被取消。在这种情况下，您获得的分数将被取消，您的报名费将被退还。
您可以在“主页”选项卡的“正在进行比赛”中查看对手的比赛状态。
比赛结束后，玩家将获得与其排名相对应的奖品。奖品信息可以在主页“已完成比赛”或余额中页面中找到。

English:
We have two ranks: CASH Rank(Rank by the Gold Medals) and TICKET Rank(Rank by the Silver Medals).Winners of Cash Games can get Gold medals, and winners of Ticket Games can get Silver medals. The medals players have won are shown on the match result page.

In the Rank tab, players are ranked based on the number of medals they have. When different players earn the same number of medals, the player who reaches that number first will rank higher. After each Ranking ends, the ranking prizes will be sent to the players' balance automatically. Players' medals will be also reset after each Ranking ends. The Ranking may last for seven days, three days, or one day and the prizes may include cash or Tickets.

Statement:
The ranking is based on all our games, Players on our games are all eligible in the same ranking.
Chinese:
我们有两个排行榜：现金排行（按金色勋章排序）和奖券排行榜（按银色勋章排序）。现金比赛的获胜者可以获得金色勋章，奖券比赛的获胜者可以获得银色勋章。玩家赢得的勋章数量将显示在比赛结果页面上。

在排行榜中，玩家将根据他们拥有的勋章数量进行排名。当不同的玩家获得相同数量的勋章时，首先达到该数量勋章的玩家排名更高。在排行榜结算倒计时结束后，排行榜结算奖励将自动发送至玩家余额中。且每次排行榜结算后，玩家的勋章也将被重置。排行榜可能持续7天、3天或1天，奖品可能包括现金或奖券。

注意：
排名基于我们所有的游戏，我们游戏中的玩家都有资格参与排行榜。

English:
1. Matching & Fair
A fair and secure matching algorithm is the technical basis for fair gaming. Making sure that players are matched by skill level has always been a major focus of our app development. We also take questions of fairness and accusations of cheating very seriously. If you have any concerns about the fairness of a game, feel free to reach out to Player Support.
2.Same Match
We use the corresponding match generation mechanism , to ensure both players play the same match with the same conditions. Players have the same initial board and the same refreshed pieces. It is the player's actions that determine the player's score.
Chinese:
1. 匹配与公平
公平安全的匹配算法是公平博弈的技术基础。确保玩家按照自己的技能水平匹配一直是我们开发的重点。我们也非常认真地对待公平问题和作弊问题。如果您对游戏的公平性有任何疑问，请随时通过“玩家支持”页面联系我们。
2.相同比赛
我们使用相同的比赛生成机制以确保两个玩家在相同的条件下进行相同的比赛。同个比赛的玩家拥有相同的初始界面和相同的刷新内容。而玩家的操作影响玩家的得分。

English: We do not tolerate cheating or fraud under any circumstances. We are continually working to prevent activities that take advantage of the platform. If you suspect that cheating has occurred in a match, you can report the Match ID to Player Support, and we will look into the case. Any player who cheats will be permanently banned from our apps. To prevent the misuse of this feature, we will not share the details of the investigation with anyone.
Chinese: 在任何情况下，我们都不会容忍作弊或欺诈。我们一直在努力防止利用该平台进行作弊活动。如果您怀疑比赛中发生作弊行为，您可以将比赛ID通过玩家支持举报给我们以便我们进行调查处理。任何作弊的玩家都将被永久禁止使用。为防止玩家滥用此功能，我们不会与任何人分享调查的详细信息。

English:
A Match ID is an identifier for a match you have played.To help check the details of a match, Player Support will usually ask you for a Match ID when you report an issue on a match.To find a Match ID, go to the Result tab and tap on the match you want to check. The Match ID is located at the bottom of the result page under the Date.
To copy a Match ID, click the copy botton and then you will copy Match ID successfully.
For questions regarding a match, go to Menu in the top right corner -> Help Center -> Contact Us, and paste the Match ID in the textbox "Enter Match ID." Send your questions or feedback, as well as the Match ID send to us, so that we can better understand the issue and answer your question.
Chinese:
比赛ID是您参加过的比赛的标识符，是为了更方便帮助检查比赛的详细信息。当您报告比赛问题时通常会要求您提供比赛ID。要找到比赛ID，请访问个人主页，然后点击您要查找的比赛结算结果，比赛ID位于结算界面底部的日期下方。
如果需要复制比赛ID，请单击比赛ID后的复制按钮，然后您将成功复制比赛ID。
如果您要咨询比赛的问题，请点击右上角的菜单按钮 -> 帮助中心 -> 联系我们，然后将比赛ID 粘贴到文本框“输入比赛ID”中。 将您的问题以及比赛ID 发送给我们，以便我们更好地了解问题并进行回答。

English:
You will be matched with an opponent of a similar skill level. Sometimes it takes time to find someone who is as skilled as you are.
In 1v1 games, opponent searching can be valid for up to 24 hours if an opponent of similar skill is not available. A match will be canceled after 24 hours if an opponent of similar skill cannot be found, and the Entry Fee will be refunded to your balance automatically.
In Tournaments, if the number of players fails to reach the required number of participants within 24 hours, the Tournament will be canceled and the Entry Fee will be refunded to your balance automatically. You may start a new match while we search for an opponent for you.
Chinese:
在匹配时，您将与技能水平相近的对手相匹配。因此有时需要一定的时间才能找到与您一样技能水平的对手。
在1v1游戏中，如果没有找到相近技能的对手，匹配时间最长可达24小时。 在 24小时后若仍找不到相近技能的对手，比赛将被取消，参赛费将自动退还到您的余额中。
在锦标赛中，如果参赛人数在24小时内未达到规定的参赛人数，锦标赛将被取消，报名费将自动退还到您的余额中。 当我们为您寻找对手时，您可以开始新的比赛。

English:
In 1v1 games, if your match ends in a draw, you will need to have a rematch with the same opponent within 24 hours, of which the result will be final. Absence from the rematch will result in a score of 0.
However, the two players will receive half of their prize(s) if:
1. both players are absent from the rematch; or
2. the rematch also ends in a draw.
In Tournaments, events and Multiplayer games, if two or more players reached the same final score, the player who finishes the game earlier will rank higher.
Chinese:
在1v1比赛中，如果您的比赛以平局结束，您需要在24小时内与同一对手进行决胜局，决胜局结果将是最终结果。缺席决胜局将被记为0分。
但是，如果出现以下情况，两名玩家将各获得一半的奖金：
1. 双方选手均缺席决胜局；
2. 决胜局也以平局告终。
在锦标赛、活动赛和多人赛中，如果两名或更多玩家获得相同的分数，则较早完成比赛的玩家排名更高。

English:
You can make deposits into your game account byfollowing the steps below:
1. Go to the Deposit tab.
2. Tap one of the Deposit Amount options in the Deposit tab.
3. Select a payment method. You can choose from credit/debit card, PayPal and other payment method.
4. Enter your payment information on the payment page, ensuring that there are no mistakes.
5. Complete the payment by tapping the payment button at the bottom.
The amount you deposited will be added to your balance right away. You can find your new balance information by tapping the Menu icon in the top right corner and tapping "Balance".
Chinese:
您可以按照以下步骤向您的游戏账户充值：
1，转到存款页面；
2，点击存款中的存款金额选项之一；
3，选择付款方式，你可以选择信用卡/借记卡、PayPal和其他付款方式；
4，在支付页面输入您的支付信息，确保没有错误；
5，点击底部的支付按钮完成支付；
您存入的金额将立即添加到您的余额中。您可以通过点击右上角的菜单图标并点击“余额”来找到您的新余额信息。

English: We sometimes advertise promotional Bonus Cash offers via email or through in-app promotions.After you verify your email account, you will receive limited-time offers that we push to you from time to time. You can also log in to the game at any time to check if there are the latest special offers. Note that not all offers are available to all players. If you don’t see the special offer on the Store screen, please check back again soon.
Chinese: 我们有时会通过电子邮件或游戏内宣传限时优惠礼包。在您验证您的电子邮件帐户后，您将不定时收到我们为您准备的限时优惠礼包。您也可以随时登录游戏查看是否有最新的特价优惠。请注意，并非所有优惠都适用于所有玩家。如果您没有在商店屏幕上看到限时优惠，请稍后再回来查看。

English:
You can withdraw cash by submitting a withdrawal application. To submit a withdrawal application, please tap the Menu icon in the top right corner and tap "Withdrawal." Your current balance information is shown on the top section of the page. You can enter a withdrawal amount next to the dollar sign in the "Withdrawal Information" section. After you enter an amount, you will be able to see the amount of Bonus Cash that will be forfeited after the withdrawal, the processing fee the withdrawal will cost, the withdrawal amount you will receive, and the total transaction amount that will be deducted from your balance. Tap the "Submit" button at the bottom of the page to submit the withdrawal application. Please note that all of the Bonus Cash you have will be:
Frozen while your withdrawal application is being processed; and Forfeited after the withdrawal application is approved and/or the withdrawal amount is sent.
It may take 10 or more business days for your bank to receive the Withdrawal Amount. If you do not receive your Withdrawal Amount during the time indicated, please feel free to reach out to our customer service agents by going to "Player Support" in the app.
Chinese:
您可以通过提交提现申请来提取现金。要提交提现申请，请点击右上角的菜单图标，然后点击“提现”。您当前的余额信息显示在页面的顶部。您可以在“提款信息”部分的输入框旁边输入提现金额。输入金额后，您将能够看到提款后将被没收的奖励金金额、提现手续费、实际收到的提现金额以及将从中扣除的总金额。点击页面底部的“提交”按钮提交提现申请。请注意，在您提交提现申请时，您拥有的所有奖励金将被：
在您提交提现申请时被冻结；并且在提现申请获得批准和/或提现金额发送后被没收。
您的银行可能需要10个或更多个工作日才能收到体现金额。如果您在指定的时间内没有收到体现金额，请随时通过应用程序中的“玩家支持”与我们联系。

English:
For any funds added to your account, your account will be credited for the amount deposited net of service fees to cover the costs we need to pay for the transaction; the service fee for each deposit is equal to15% of the amount deposited into your account and will be charged when you submit a withdrawal application.

The service fee, however, is waived when 50% of the amount of cash deposited into your account has been used to pay Entry Fees of games in the game.

For example, if you deposit $100 and then attempt towithdraw $90, in order to avoid having to pay the withdrawal tax,you must first join matches with entryfees that total at least $50($100 x 50%= $50).(The $50entry fee threshold could be met with, for example, one $50 entry or 10 $5 entry matches). Otherwise, when you make a withdrawal, you must pay a tax equal to 15% of the withdrawal amount. In this case, you would have to pay $13.50 ($90 x 15%)on a $90 withdrawal.

Statement:
Withdrawals under $10.00 are subject to a $1.50 processing fee.The minimum withdrawal is $2.00, and the withdrawal amount must be a whole number.
Chinese:
对于充值到您账户的资金，应为扣除服务费后剩余的金额，服务费为我们支付给支付渠道的交易费用；每笔存款的服务费等于存入您账户的金额15%，服务费将在您提交提现申请时收取。

但是，当存入您账户的现金金额的50%已用于支付游戏中的游戏入场费时，服务费将被免除。

例如，如果您存入100美元，然后尝试提取 90 美元，为了避免支付手续费，您必须首先参加总入场费至少为 50 美元的比赛（100 美元 x 50%= 50 美元）。（50 美元入场费，例如，可以通过参参与一场50 美元的比赛或 10 个 5 美元的比赛来满足条件）。 否则，当您提现时，您必须缴纳相当于取款金额 15%的手续费。 在这种情况下，您必须为 90 美元的提款支付 13.50 美元（90 美元 x 15%）。

注意：
低于 10.00 美元的提款需支付 1.50 美元的手续费。最低提款为 2.00 美元，且提款金额需为整数。

English: You can go to Menu in the top right corner -> balance. On the cash balance page, you can view the Cash that Available to Withdraw and the Bonus Cash you have. You can also view their detailed account changes on the page.
Chinese: 您可以转到右上角的菜单-> 余额。 在现金余额页面，您可以查看可提取现金和您拥有的奖励金金额。您还可以在页面上查看他们的详细账变。

English:
When you open the game for the first time, you are automatically signed as guest. To update your account:
1. Tap the icon on the top right of the main menu page.
2. Tap Account
3. Tap Save Account in the account page.
Chinese:
当您第一次打开游戏时，您将使用游客登录。要升级您的帐户：
1.点击主菜单页面右上角的图标。
2.点击账户
3.在账户页面点击保存账户。

English: You can reset your password by tapping "Forgot your password?" on the sign-up/log-in page.
Chinese: 您可以在注册/登录界面上点击“忘记密码？”按钮来重置密码。

English: Your personal information will only be used for withdrawal applications. When you submit a withdrawal application, we require your personal information, including your name, phone number, address, and PayPal account to verify your identity and make sure the withdrawal amount will be sent to you directly. Our developer uses various measures, including access control and authenticated encryption, to secure players' data, including personal information and game records. Your personal information will never be given to any third party or used for any other purpose.
Chinese: 您的个人信息将仅用于提现。当您提交提现申请时，我们需要您的个人信息，包括您的姓名、电话号码、地址和PayPal账户，以验证您的身份，并确保提现金额将直接发送给您。我们使用包括访问控制和身份验证等加密措施，以保护玩家的数据，包括个人信息和游戏记录。 您的个人信息绝不会提供给任何第三方或用于任何其他目的。

English:
A sign-up verification email will be sent to your email address when it is successully linked to your account. If you have not received the email, try doing the following:
1. Check your spam folder.
2. Try linking your email to your account again by tapping the Menu icon -> "Manage Accounts" -> "Connect your email." Make sure you enter the correct email address before you tap the "Add Email Account" button.
3. If you still haven't received a verification email, please contact our customer service agents through "Player Support" in the app.
Chinese:
注册验证电子邮件将在成功链接到您的帐户后发送到您的电子邮件地址。 如果您没有收到电子邮件，请尝试执行以下操作：
1. 检查您的垃圾邮件文件夹。
2. 点按菜单图标 ->“管理帐户”->“连接您的电子邮件”，再次尝试将您的电子邮件链接到您的帐户。 在点击“添加电子邮件帐户”按钮之前，请确保输入正确的电子邮件地址。
3. 如果您仍未收到验证邮件，请通过游戏中的“玩家支持”与我们联系。

English:
When you open the game for the first time,you may only change your username once, To change you username:
1. Tap your profile picture in the top left corner and enter your Profile page.
2. Tap the edit icon in the top right corner.
3. Tap your Nickname and start editing.
4. Tap "Submit" button after editing.

But if you have no times, you need a "Rename Card.", you can change your username by following thesesteps:
1. Go to the Ticket Store.
2. Redeem a "Rename Card."
3. Then you can follow the steps above to modify your nickname.
Chinese:
当您第一次打开游戏时，您可以更改一次用户名，要更改您的用户名：
1，点击左上角您的头像，进入您的个人资料页面；
2，点击右上角的编辑图标；
3，点击您的昵称并开始编辑；
4，编辑完成后点击“提交”按钮。

但是如果你没有更改次数，你需要一张“改名卡”，你可以按照以下步骤更改你的用户名：
1，前往奖券商城；
2，兑换“改名卡”；
3，然后就可以按照上面的步骤修改昵称了。

English: You may use your account to log in to different apps provided by GaoShou. You can also share the same account balance between these accounts.
Chinese: 您可以使用您的帐户登录高手提供的不同应用程序。 您还可以在这些帐户之间共享帐户余额。

English:
You can send us a message by tapping the Menu icon in the top right corner -> "Help Center" ->"Contact Us".
You may select an issue and describe the issue in less then 140 words. You may also Insert up to three images(less than 3MB pre image). We will get back to you ASAP.
Chinese:
您可以通过点击右上角的菜单图标->“帮助中心”->“联系我们”向我们发送消息。
您可以选择一个问题并用少于140个字来描述该问题，您还可以插入最多三张小于3MB图片，在收到问题后我们将会尽快回复您。
